sqlMap.select: SELECT sp.enrollment_number AS enrollmentNumber, CONCAT_WS(' ',sm.student_first_name,sm.student_middle_name,sm.student_last_name) AS studentName, sp.entity_id AS entityId, sp.program_id AS programId, sp.branch_id AS branchId, sp.specialization_id AS specializationId, sp.current_semester AS semesterCode, pch.program_course_key AS programCourseKey, pr.semester_start_date AS semesterStartDate, pr.semester_end_date AS semesterEndDate, cm.grade_limit_active AS gradelimit, cmas.status AS reason, srsh.status AS status FROM student_program sp JOIN student_master sm ON sp.enrollment_number=sm.enrollment_number AND sp.program_status='ACT' AND sp.entity_id=sm.parent_entity AND sm.university_code=#universityId# JOIN program_course_header pch ON sp.program_id=pch.program_id AND sp.branch_id=pch.branch_id AND sp.specialization_id=pch.specialization_id AND sp.current_semester=pch.semester_code AND pch.semester_status='ACT' JOIN program_registration pr ON pch.program_course_key=pr.program_course_key AND sp.entity_id=pr.entity_id AND pr.status='ACT' AND sm.university_code=pr.university_id JOIN student_registration_semester_header srsh ON srsh.roll_number=sp.roll_number AND srsh.entity_id=sp.entity_id AND srsh.program_course_key=pch.program_course_key AND srsh.session_start_date=pr.semester_start_date AND srsh.session_end_date=pr.semester_end_date JOIN course_marks_approval_status cmas ON pch.program_course_key=cmas.program_course_key AND cmas.entity_id=sp.entity_id AND cmas.semester_start_date=pr.semester_start_date AND cmas.semester_end_date=pr.semester_end_date AND cmas.course_code=#courseCode# AND cmas.display_type=#displayType# AND cmas.approval_order= (SELECT MAX(approval_order) FROM course_marks_approval_status WHERE program_course_key=pch.program_course_key AND entity_id=sp.entity_id AND semester_start_date=pr.semester_start_date AND semester_end_date=pr.semester_end_date AND course_code=#courseCode# AND display_type=#displayType#) JOIN course_master cm ON cm.university_code=sm.university_code AND cm.course_code=cmas.course_code AND pr.session_start_date=#sessionStartDate# AND pr.session_end_date=#sessionEndDate# AND sp.roll_number=#rollNumber#;

select sm.roll_number AS rollNumber, sm.evaluation_id AS evaluationId, sm.attendence AS attendence, sm.marks AS marks, sm.grades AS grades, sm.pass_fail AS passfail, sms.total_internal AS totalInternal, sms.total_external AS totalExternal, sms.total_marks AS total, sms.internal_grade AS internalGrade, sms.external_grade AS externalGrade from student_marks sm,student_marks_summary sms where sm.course_code=#courseCode# and sm.course_code=sms.course_code and sm.university_code=#universityId# and sm.semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and sm.semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate# and sm.entity_id=#entityId# and sm.entity_id=sms.entity_id and sm.program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and sm.roll_number=sms.roll_number and sm.evaluation_id IN (select cec.evaluation_id from evaluation_component ec, course_evaluation_component cec where cec.program_id=#programId# and course_code=#courseCode# and ec.evaluation_id=cec.evaluation_id and ec.display_type=#displayType# and ec.university_code=#universityId#) AND sm.roll_number=#rollNumber#;
SELECT SUBSTRING(#employeeId#,2,8) AS entityId, employee_code AS employeeCode FROM employee_master WHERE employee_id=#employeeId#;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE student_marks SET marks=#marks# ,attendence=#attendence#, grades=#grades#, modifier_id=#modifierId#, modification_time=now(), old_marks=#oldmarks# WHERE university_code=#universityId# AND roll_number=#rollNumber# AND program_course_key=#programCourseKey# AND evaluation_id=#evaluationId# AND course_code=#courseCode# AND semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate#;

UPDATE student_marks_summary SET total_internal=#totalInternal#, internal_grade=#internalGrade#, modifier_id=#modifierId#, modification_time=now() WHERE university_code=#universityId# AND program_course_key=#programCourseKey# AND roll_number=#rollNumber# AND course_code=#courseCode# AND semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# AND semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate#;

UPDATE student_marks_summary SET total_external=#totalExternal#, external_grade=#externalGrade#, modifier_id=#modifierId#, modification_time=now() WHERE university_code=#universityId# AND program_course_key=#programCourseKey# AND roll_number=#rollNumber# AND course_code=#courseCode# AND semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# AND semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate#;
sqlMap.select: SELECT pr.semester_start_date AS semesterStartDate, pr.semester_end_date AS semesterEndDate, pr.program_course_key AS programCourseKey FROM program_registration pr WHERE pr.session_start_date=#sessionStartDate# AND pr.session_end_date=#sessionEndDate# AND pr.entity_id=#entityId# AND pr.status='ACT' AND program_course_key=(SELECT program_course_key FROM program_course_header WHERE program_id=#programId# AND branch_id=#branchId# AND specialization_id=#specializationId# AND semester_code=#semesterCode# AND semester_status='ACT');

SELECT cma.employee_id AS employeeCode, CONCAT(' ',em.first_name,em.middle_name,em.last_name) AS employeeName FROM course_marks_approval cma JOIN employee_master em ON cma.employee_id=em.employee_code AND cma.program_course_key=#programCourseKey# AND cma.course_code=#courseCode# AND cma.entity_id=#entityId# AND cma.approval_order='1';

SELECT sm.roll_number AS rollNumber, CONCAT_WS(' ',sma.student_first_name,sma.student_middle_name,sma.student_last_name) AS studentName, sm.evaluation_id AS evaluationId, sm.attendence AS attendence, sm.marks AS marks, sm.grades AS grades, sm.pass_fail AS passfail, sms.total_internal AS totalInternal, sms.total_external AS totalExternal, sms.total_marks AS totalMarks, sms.internal_grade AS internalGrade, sms.external_grade AS externalGrade FROM student_marks sm JOIN student_marks_summary sms ON sm.roll_number=sms.roll_number AND sm.course_code=#courseCode# AND sm.course_code=sms.course_code AND sm.university_code=#universityId# AND sm.semester_start_date=#startDate# AND sm.semester_end_date=#endDate# AND sm.entity_id=#entityId# AND sm.entity_id=sms.entity_id AND sm.program_course_key=#programCourseKey# AND sm.evaluation_id IN (SELECT cec.evaluation_id FROM evaluation_component ec, course_evaluation_component cec WHERE cec.program_id=#programId# AND course_code=#courseCode# AND ec.evaluation_id=cec.evaluation_id AND ec.display_type=#displayType# AND ec.university_code=#universityId#) JOIN student_program sp ON sp.roll_number=sm.roll_number AND sp.roll_number=sms.roll_number JOIN student_master sma ON sp.enrollment_number=sma.enrollment_number AND sma.university_code=sm.university_code JOIN course_evaluation_component cec ON sp.program_id=cec.program_id AND sm.course_code=cec.course_code ANd sm.evaluation_id=cec.evaluation_id ORDER BY sm.roll_number, cec.order_in_awardsheet;
